content: Hey @WG-async-foundations, book updates? I'm running a bit behind today, here now...
I haven't really had any mental energy to devote to the book lately
I've been hacking more on the "surprisingly hard things" but no real updates
Hi, can I help out with the Async book at all? I'm reading through it right now, and could contribute editing or writing.
Sure! If there's a todo section you feel comfortable writing about, feel free to take that on!
@Taylor Cramer do I just send a PR? Just a tad concerned about spending hours/days and having it bounce back. Definitely happy to take a shot though, will get started on it this week.
@Arthur feel free to open an issue if there's a particular topic you're looking to focus on, and we can chat about it there
